abstrac: Blockchain and VoIP Carrier grade Implementations Specialist
bio:
I specialize in VOIP, Asterisk Dialplan programming, IVRs, Call Termination Setups, Call Center Setups with predictive dialing, SMS solutions, Telecom Billing, Cisco based Networks for Voice, Linux Servers Administration and Engineering.

I am a pure Asterisk coder with carrier grade implementations using clusters with Load Balancers like OpenSIPs and Kamalio. 

- Tremendous exposure to the American telecom market

- Excellent English and Communication Skills

- VoIP Clustering and Redundancy solutions

- Dialers, SMS and Faxing Setups

Innovated, Repositioned and Rebranded a phone service for an American Telco with a new feature called "International Money Transactions" and bought a sales increase of 37 % in 5 months.

· Developed new markets for potential products and services; recently executed a sales project based upon social networks and boosted the company’s revenue by 27%.

My specialties are,

- Asterisk Dial Plan Programming with database Integration (MYSQL, MSSQL, Oracle)

- Custom IVR setup and programming

- Telecom Billing setup (A2Billing and other opensource billing)

- Calling Card Application setup (Pin based and Pinless)

- Softswitch setup for Call Termination with billing and CDRs (Call Detail Records)

- VOIP based Phone service setup

- Call Center Setup for both Inbound and Outbound using (Vicidial, Vicibox Redux)

- Linux Servers Administration from installation to troubleshooting ( Servers : Web Apache/Windows IIS, PostFix Mail, SendMail, FTP with VSFTPD, Asterisk, OpenVPN, MySql, Cron, DNS, TFTP for IP Device Provisioning, Squid Proxy Server, SSH, Samba File Sharing )

- Call Blast and SMS Blast Solution Implementation with VTiger Opensource and Sugar CRM Implementation for Business Intelligence.

- DID mapping, provisioning and configuration

- Voice Over VPN using OpenVPN tunelling and bridging

- Implemented Linux as a ROUTER for network security using IP TABLES

- Configuration of VOIP Equipment ( Routers, Gateways, Quintums, IP Phones, ATAs) using SIP and H323 protocols

- DTMF debugging and logging

• Design and proactively manage the overall data & VoIP network architecture.

• Hands on with Sales and Distribution ERP applications, CRM, Business Intelligence, Business Analytics, Business Process flow-charting.

VTiger CRM Integration to Asterisk,

SIP /PSTN trunking,

SIP DIDs configurations,

Multi lingual IVR (Interactive Voice Response) integrated with database,

Text to Speech (TTS) engine integrations and call recordings.

Advance features IP PBX,

CDR - Call Detail Reporting,

Remote Installation/support for asterisk,

Custom Development for IP telephony to the CRM - customer relationship management system,

Telecom billing system,

Telemarketing application development,

Call back system

I offer WordPress, PHP, ASP.NET, C#, C++, HTML, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, AJAX, Python, Ruby on Rails, and JAVA development services ; I can assist with web,  game, mobile, windows software, and firmware development.

If you're looking for a reliable developer that delivers work that stands the test of time - it's me. I like to think of myself as an all-round ringer as I enjoy seeing projects to completion. 

I specialize in a diverse range of expertise that is hyper-focused on saving you time, producing high quality code, and achieving success. 

I take your projects and goals seriously and I endeavor to show this in my work irrespective of budget or project size. 

I have 14 years of industry experience and I never stop learning. Each day is an opportunity to get better at my craft and my attitude equates to better communication on every project.

bio:
Greetings,

I am a certified web developer with 10+ years of experience developing complicated SaaS web applications, enterprise business websites, and small personal blogs.
I am specialized in JavaScript/ECMAScript/TypeScript based front-end web applications.
Especially, I am currently focusing on Angular 8+ and Firebase based application development as well as AngularJS 1.x, and Node.js development.
I love to write code in a high-paced and challenging environment with an emphasis on using best practices to develop high-quality software that meets project requirements, budget, and schedule.
My eye for design and creativity has made me a strong front-end developer that can bring your vision for a website or UI/UX to life.
I enjoy learning new technologies and sharing findings with team members.
Above all, I am a great team player.

PREFERRED ENVIRONMENT
Angular 8+, Firebase, Cloud Function, Node.js HTML5, CSS3, SASS/LESS, Bootstrap 4

EXPERIENCE
Front-end and back-end development
● Pure JavaScript, ECMAScript(ES6, ES7, and ES8) and TypeScript
● AngularJS 1.x and Angular 2~10
● Firebase/Google Cloud, AWS, and Heroku
● Node.js and Express.js
● MongoDB and Mongoose
● Chart.js, Highcharts, ECharts, amCharts, Chartist, and D3.js
Angular Stack
● PrimeNG, NG_ZORRO, Angular Material, NGX Bootstrap, and NG Semantic-UI
● NgRx(Store, Effects, Actions)
● ReactiveX/RxJS
● NGX Modal Dialog, Angular2-Notification, and Ng2-Toastr
● NG2 Charts, Angular-nvD3, amCharts3-Angular2 and Angular-Highcharts
● Ng Sidebar, Ng2 Tree, NG2 Table, NGX Datatable and Angular-Calendar
● Angular Google Maps, NGX Leaflet, Ng2 Cloudinary and Angular Share Buttons
Testing frameworks
● Jasmine, Karma, and Protractor
● Jest, Enzyme, Mocha, Chai
Pixel perfect and mobile responsive development
● HTML/HTML5, CSS/CSS3 and LESS/SASS/SCSS
● Bootstrap, Material UI and Semantic UI
Project management and version control
● Jira, Trello, and Asana
● GitHub, Bitbucket, GitLab, and SVN

Thanks.

I prefer a full-time Angular development.
I always work for more than 8 hours per day.
I prefer working through Guru and get paid through Guru.

abstrac: Expert Web Designer & Certified CyberSecurity Expert!
bio:
Expert Web Designer & Certified CyberSecurity Expert:

If you need a complex project, that needs a custom modern design, with custom made systems tailor made to fit your requirements, I am your problem solver. With 9 years of experience, hundreds of projects and almost 100 happy customers, that you can see from my reviews below, I can develop sites from real estate, directory, dating to marketplaces and booking, so whatever challenge you're facing, I can help.
I have more than 4 years of experience in Web, Logos, Illustrations, Banners and Brochures design.
I provide solutions for companies or individuals interested in outsourcing their design needs.
I specialize in developing high quality look & feel interfacesand advanced server-side programming (PHP, Ajax, Java, MySQL, XHTML CSS, XML).
I'm expert in graphic and web design / development. Also I have great experience with WordPress.
I place great importance on small details and try to bring something new to every project.

I have 5+ years of experience in Risk and Vulnerability Management, implementation of Security Frameworks, and Policy Compliance working for Fortune 100 Companies such as Goldman Sachs, StateFarm Insurance, and Warner Bros.
I am a hands-on cybersecurity expert who can provide you the most optimal solution in the following areas:
Design and Implement Network Security
Design and Implement Security Architecture Framework
Vendor Security Control Review and Risk Evaluations
PCI, ISO27001, HIPAA, and MPAAA Audit Readiness
I have an MS in Information Security and hold the following certifications:
- CISSP
- CEH
- CISA
- CWSP
- SANS GPEN
- SANS GMON
- SANS GCCC
- SANS GIAC
- SANS GSSP
- PMP
Accomplishments:
Implemented security controls for Warner Bros. iconic shows and movies such as Harry Potter, The Game of Thrones, Curb your enthusiasm.
I have implemented Secure SDLC for video games from EA Sports such as FIFA and The Sims.
Secured financial information for high net-worth clients.

eWeb A1Professionals Pvt. Ltd. is an Enterprise Business Solution provider,
We excel at conceiving, designing, developing and implementing enterprise level applications and projects on multiple platforms.

Our job is to make your job easier!

With over 100 qualified developers, designers, testers sitting under one roof our organization is a powerhouse of creativity we strive and strife to make your targets and mission our primary responsibility.
